alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:12AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dallas County through 745 AM CDT... At 712 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Mesquite, Rowlett, Balch Springs, University Park, Highland Park, Cockrell Hill, Sunnyvale, Dallas Love Field, White Rock Lake and Lake Ray Hubbard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for north central Texas.
